item.title: Google Analytics & Event Tracking
item.description: Google Analytics provides a number of extra tools for the adventurous to improve tracking and provide valuable insights. There are two types of tracking you can have – event tracking is used to help analyse visitor behaviour onsite. It’s not complicated to do this – but it’s time consuming and complex. Google Analytics is one of the web’s most popular tools for reporting on activity and trends for just about any website.
